text: Ariko abanyacyubahiro bo mu bantu be bahakanye, baravuga bati "Uyu ntacyo ari cyo usibye kuba ari umuntu nkamwe, icyo ashaka ni ukwishyira hejuru (ngo abategeke). Kandi iyo Allahaza gushaka (kohereza intumwa) yari kohereza Malayika. Ntabwo twigeze twumva ibintu nkâ€™ibi ku babyeyi bacu bo hambere
